description: Interface for Uniswap V3 swap router contract

functions.name: exactInputSingle
functions.signature: function exactInputSingle(ExactInputSingleParams calldata params) external payable returns (uint256 amountOut)
functions.description: Swaps amountIn of one token for as much as possible of another token

functions.name: exactOutputSingle
functions.signature: function exactOutputSingle(ExactOutputSingleParams calldata params) external payable returns (uint256 amountIn)
functions.description: Swaps as little as possible of one token for amountOut of another token

functions.name: exactInput
functions.signature: function exactInput(ExactInputParams calldata params) external payable returns (uint256 amountOut)
functions.description: Swaps amountIn of one token for as much as possible of another along the specified path

functions.name: exactOutput
functions.signature: function exactOutput(ExactOutputParams calldata params) external payable returns (uint256 amountIn)
functions.description: Swaps as little as possible of one token for amountOut of another along the specified path

structs.name: ExactInputSingleParams
structs.fields: tokenIn, tokenOut, fee, recipient, deadline, amountIn, amountOutMinimum, sqrtPriceLimitX96

structs.name: ExactOutputSingleParams
structs.fields: tokenIn, tokenOut, fee, recipient, deadline, amountOut, amountInMaximum, sqrtPriceLimitX96
